info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 10:54PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD AND CENTRAL WESTCHESTER COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1053 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bedford, or over Mount Kisco, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Norwalk, New Canaan, Greenwich, Westport, Darien, Bedford, Pleasantville, Armonk, and Thornwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
